Reviews.Title: fast but incomplete
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: I received it very fast but incomplete. Then after a call, they send me one week later the missing items.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens
Canon EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Rechargeable LPE8 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger
3 Piece Filter Kit Includes: UV, Circular Polarizer and Flourescent Filter and Hard Case+Mini Table Top Tripod
Pack of LCD Screen Protectors + Lens/LCD Maintenance Cleaning Kit
FOUR 16GB SDHC Secure Digital Memory Cards + Multi 50 in 1 USB Card Reader
Full Size 50" Tripod W/Carry Bag+Padded Carrying Case w/Strap + Memory Card Wallet
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens + Canon EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Lens LPE8 Battery / Charger Filter Kit 64GB Tripod DavisMAX Bundle
